thread.title: Populus Group to Exhibit at 2015 NMSDC Conference in San Diego
thread.title_full: Populus Group to Exhibit at 2015 NMSDC Conference in San Diego

author: Jennifer Pasquier
title: Populus Group to Exhibit at 2015 NMSDC Conference in San Diego
text:
Populus Group, LLC, a talent management solutions provider, will be exhibiting at the annual National Minority Supplier Development Council Conference and Business Opportunity Exchange in San Diego October 18-21, 2015 at the San Diego Convention Center. The theme for this year’s conference is "Certify > Develop > Connect > and Advocate for solid minority firms in the global corporate supply chain". Populus Group, an NMSDC member, will be hosting an exhibit booth (#327), where attendees can learn about its innovative solutions for candidate redeployment, intern management and foreign national immigration. These solutions compliment other services offered through their Integrated Workforce Management (IWMF) solution, such as Professional Payroll Services, Independent Contractor Engagement Services, and Staffing and Recruiting Services. Populus Group works closely with each of its clients to develop a program that addresses their specific contingent workforce needs.
"We've been partnering with our customers to explore new ways to drive innovation in their contingent workforce programs while also capturing diversity spend. We're excited to share how we've evolved to help our customers enhance their solutions at the NMSDC Conference next week." Says Mario Lambert, Director of Sales at Populus Group.
About Populus Group
At Populus Group, we exist because we believe everyone should have an opportunity to succeed. We believe in backing up our promises with measurable action to build great relationships. Since our inception in 2002, our goal has been to provide clients with a comprehensive and diverse offering of talent management solutions that meet our client’s objectives and drive innovation, while at the same time ensuring that the over change management is seamless to their entire organization.
Populus Group has engagement coverage across the entire U.S. driven from nine major metropolitan areas: Baltimore, Chicago, Troy, New York, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Portland, San Francisco, and Seattle. Populus Group is a privately-held, Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) certified in all 50 states via the Michigan Minority Supplier Development Council. To learn more: http://www.populusgroup.com .
